title: The Vanishing
description: The Fey of Auroara have guided and protected the people of the empire for centuries but nothing can last forever. Without warning the goddess of magic falls silent. As their magical abilities start to fade the Fey retreat to their towers and are soon locked in glittering cages of their own making. Sensing weakness the mad god sets into motion a series of events that will soon see the entire world engulfed in war. Hope lies in an unusually powerful Melior-Fey who is determined to find his missing brother. The young Fey's journey will take him across the empire and into the land of the enemy. In the end the fate of not only the world but the entire multiverse will hang in the balance.
author: Joshua Cain
